reviewText: Any Tiger fan will love re-living the 1984 Fall Classic with actual play-by-play calls from NBC's Vin Scully and Joe Garaciola as well as commentary from Bob Costas.  For almost an hour, I felt 30 years younger.  You can't beat that.
For Detroit fans. Taken from the NBC broadcast, so we have actually play by play calls instead of strict narration.
